import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import border from '../../res/border.png'; import './info.css'; import bars from '../../res/bars.gif'; import left from '../../res/left-airpod.webp'; import right from '../../res/right-airpod.webp'; import tunnel from '../../res/tunnel.mp4'; const Info = () => { const { ref, inView } = useInView({ threshold: 0.1, }); return (

STAN

WITH LOVE,
STANLEY

) } export default Info
